data.name: You Better Run
data.detailed_description:
Game is set on a small island where one of your friends lives. It was a calm evening and everyone was just chilling, till one of your friends found a bomb in an attic. It turned the evening into chaos, because your friend went crazy and wanted to stick that bomb behind your back and you all started running away!

ONLINE/LAN MULTIPLAYER

Join your friends online or through a local network to have fun together.

USE ABILITIES

Discover ridiculous power-ups and place them in order for winning combinations.

-MOLOTOV COCKTAIL
-ICE FREEZE
-TOXIC GAS
-DASH

THE ANGRY CHICKEN

Beware of angry chicken, which might slow you down...

WEEKLY LEADERBOARD

Stay top on weekly leaderboard with most wins.

data.short_description: You Better Run is a fun party online multiplayer indie game for (2-4) players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel/AMD Grpahics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game also support local network without internet connection
